data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 3, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Inter territory.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 9, Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Inter's Stefan De Vrij goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 10, Free kick Inter.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Inter drive upfield and Roberto Gagliardini gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bologna defender.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Inter.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Milan, Mattias Svanberg of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bologna's Musa Barrow is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Goal! Romelu Lukaku gives Inter a 1-0 lead in Milan.
Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Bologna in the half of Inter.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Musa Barrow gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Inter.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
In the minute 25, In Milan, Roberto Gagliardini (Inter) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Mattias Svanberg of Bologna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna.
Bologna's Mattias Svanberg gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
In Milan Inter drive forward through Romelu Lukaku. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Inter, close to Bologna's area.
Important block from the Bologna defence as Alexis Sanchez fires in a strike for Inter.
Inter's Achraf Hakimi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, Paolo Valeri awards Bologna a goal kick.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Inter are caught offside.
In the minute 38, Inter have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 41, Inter push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Marcelo Brozovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bologna defence.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Paolo Valeri signals a Inter throw-in in Bologna's half.
The first half has been concluded at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 45, Inter take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Achraf Hakimi.
Marcelo Brozovic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Free kick Inter.
In the minute 50, Inter have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Throw-in for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Bologna at Giuseppe Meazza.
Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Milan.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Aaron Hickey is booked for the away team.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Inter.
Inter drives forward and Alexis Sanchez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Emanuel Vignato is on a sub for Mattias Svanberg for Bologna.
In the minute 63, Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's second substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Nicolas Dominguez replacing Gary Medel.
Omar Khailoti is replacing Aaron Hickey for Bologna at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 64, Free kick Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Throw-in Bologna.
In the minute 66, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Achraf Hakimi (Inter) has received a first yellow card.
Emanuel Vignato keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 67, That's a fine assist from Roberto Soriano.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's now 3-1 in Milan as Achraf Hakimi scores for Inter.
In the minute 70, Great play from Arturo Vidal to set up the goal.
The home team replace Arturo Vidal with Nicolo Barella.
Inter make their second substitution with Lautaro Martinez replacing Romelu Lukaku.
In the minute 71, Matteo Darmian is replacing Achraf Hakimi for the home team.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bologna's Musa Barrow gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
In the minute 73, Inter drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Inter capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Bologna's Danilo has been booked in Milan.
In the minute 75, Alexis Sanchez (Inter) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 77, Paolo Valeri signals a Bologna throw-in in Inter's half.
Paolo Valeri awards the home team a throw-in.
Bologna pushes forward through Lorenzo De Silvestri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Inter's Lautaro Martinez breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 79, Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a fifth substitution, with Edoardo Vergani replacing Rodrigo Palacio.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Musa Barrow with Simone Rabbi.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Inter.
Danilo D`Ambrosio is on a sub for Alessandro Bastoni for Inter.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Inter in the half of Bologna.
Edoardo Vergani (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna are coming forward and Roberto Soriano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Bologna are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Milan Bologna attack through Emanuel Vignato. The finish is off target, however.
Paolo Valeri awards Inter a goal kick.
Omar Khailoti for Bologna drives towards goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bologna's Emanuel Vignato gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
The home team have replaced Alexis Sanchez with Christian Eriksen. This is the fifth substitution made today by Antonio Conte.
